description.text: Generates a sinusoid weighted fit for a set of data.

float.name: Harmonics
float.descr: The number of harmonics of the sinusoid to fit.

float.name: Period
float.descr: The period of the sinusoid to fit.

table.name: Y Fitted
table.descr: The array of fitted Y values.

table.name: Residuals
table.descr: The residuals of the fitted data.

float.name: chisq
float.descr: The weighted sum of sqaures of the residuals.
